department.dept_long_name: Department of Visual and Environmental Studies

course.title: Stranger than Fiction
course.description: Much recent art stages slippages between the fictive and factual. False personas, invented histories and museums of unnatural history are some such creative deceptions - so are Punk'd, Borat, and Fear Factor. With a focus on installation art, photography, video, and performance but an eye to popular culture and political scandal, this seminar will trace artistic precedents for treating our sense of reality as a plastic material, and explore the ethical, political, and aesthetic implications.
